characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: During deployment, you can set up this unit in preparation to launch a warp strike instead of placing it on the battlefield. At the end of any of your Movement phases this unit can use their warp jump generators to enter the battlefield - set it up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" away from any enemy models. You must then immediately roll 2D6; on a 2, one model from the unit is slain.
